website_summaries.verdict: The LG Gram 15 is an ultraportable that doesn't make you sacrifice screen size or some runtime for less weight.
pros: The LG Gram 15 is one of the lightest and thinnest laptops available with a 15.6-inch display
It has good components and performance for the price and gets nearly 10 hours of battery life
Port assortment includes USB 3.0 Type-C and a full-size HDMI output
cons: The keyboard is shallow and somewhat spongy-feeling
The speakers are weak and tinny
The webcam is on the hinge, which basically means positioning it is always going to be a problem
Some might not like the overall flimsy feel to the body

customer_reviews.title: This is a great machine with one fatal design flaw
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine with one fatal design flaw, which really hit me unexpectedly once I got it last week and started using it. The keyboard is centered about two inches to the left of the middle of the trackpad. When you are typing, your palm will occasionally brush the trackpad, causing the mouse pointer to jump to somewhere else in the document or thread you are working on. Maybe I have fat palms, but dang if this isn't the most annoying thing I've encountered this week. :/
customer_reviews.author: Myyrdraal

customer_reviews.title: now losing a key a month
customer_reviews.text: About a year ago, lost the numpad asterisk, then the k, then the spacebar (do without that one) now th / - and + are gone and other keys randomly need extra punches. Support? Forget it. Told to do a google, some place in China has keyboards but maybe you'll get it in December (this is Sept 2020). You can send it in for repair which is about 2-3 weeks. All my financial information and correspondence and business for a rental property. Try doing without that for a day or two maybe! Will never buy another LG product and I've bought lots over the years for my own house and a rental property. Bye bye LG
customer_reviews.author: greenscreen

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Lightweight, Durable, and Fast!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop runs circles around my Dell and HP products and the weight is almost nothing. The only issue with this, and I knew this before I purched the product, is the lack of a CD Drive. It is a pain to convert CDs to memory sticks to load software onto the computer. It is easier to buy and download software from the manufacturer. This laptop traveled very well and slips into any carry-on bag easily. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Reader

customer_reviews.title: Works well but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this laptop for a few months now and am quite satisfied. It runs fast and surfs well, no delays as yet. And it is certainly lightweight. The only drawback is the construction--it's not particularly durable and the hardware components are crap, but that may have something to do with reducing the weight. For everyday office use this isn't a big deal, but this might not be the best machine for people who put their laptops through hard use: travel a lot, harsh working environments, etc...But it works fine for me thus far.
customer_reviews.author: GDBohun

customer_reviews.title: Better than our Apple
customer_reviews.text: We own all Apple computers and Apple stopped supporting their laptop we bought about 10 years ago. To buy an Apple with these features cost over $2000, twice as much. We like this laptop because it is lightweight, has a numeric keypad, and, long battery life. We use our iMac for pictures and videos and the laptop was used mostly for Excel and online banking. We prefer using the Windows version of Excel paying twice as much to Apple made no sense.
customer_reviews.author: GV

customer_reviews.title: It is the most amazing laptop I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rate the LG gram highly enough. It is the most amazing laptop I've ever had; so light and comfortable, screen looks great, battery life is amazing. I will be buying the LG gram models in the future... they are stunning. The only drawbacks: If you need high-performance gaming, this is not a laptop to go to. If you want to have great laptop speakers, this one isn't that great. Personally, neither of these things matter to me (headphones work perfectly).
customer_reviews.author: m27

customer_reviews.title: Great Light Weight Laptop.
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop very light and has great picture and the keyboard is perfect for me. Everything loads quickly and it can do some light gaming with integrated graphics. I have only tried Civilization 5 (Its not a gaming laptop but you never know if you'll need to kill some time so its nice to know it can at lease play some lighter games) everything about it is great. Only complaints are the glossy screen would have preferred an anti glare style and how the the left click on the track pad seems to be a little small not 50/50 more like 35/65.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Pharo

customer_reviews.title: What laptops should be.
customer_reviews.text: This is what laptops should be. The difference in weight between this and eve my 13 inch MacBook is just stunning. The LG is a pleasure to hold. I like very much: -the weight -the screen size -the touch screen -the fact that it's windows I am less keen on: -the touchpad and keyboard are not in the class of a mac -lack of accessories like hard shell cases -not sold in Canada
customer_reviews.author: Bill Rowe

customer_reviews.title: A VERY GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE 5 HP LAPTOPS, ALL OF THEM HAVE BAD KEY BOARDS I KEPT GETTING THEM BECAUSE THEY WERE CHEAP..THEY LASTED ABOUT 18 MONTHS, THEN I GET ANOTHER 5 LB BRICK OF HP TECHNOLOGY B UT THIS TIME I I SPENT MORE MONEY AND GOT THIS DELIGHTFUL LG. THIS THING IS AS LIGHT AS A FEATHER AND WORKS LIKE A DREAM. THE ONLY COMPLAINT I HAVE IS THAT THE SOUND IS VERY BAD. IF YOU CAN LIVE WITH THAT FOIBLE YOU'LL LOVE THIS THING.
customer_reviews.author: jumbo1147

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS LAPTOP!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT laptop. I wish I had just bit the bullet to get a larger hard drive, but I didn't have the budget for it. I love the laptop. Very light. Great screen. Surprisingly good speakers considering the size of this feather-light computer. Battery lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: Shiny Wings

customer_reviews.title: Happy user after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I bought the laptop for my wife. After a few months using it she is happy about it. She likes that the laptop is really lightweight, lighter, for example, than many chromebooks with smaller screens. The laptop is used for office work.
customer_reviews.author: Andriy Palamarchuk

customer_reviews.title: Light as a feather
customer_reviews.text: First this thing is light as a feather, you'll feel that you'll break it easily but it is really durable and well designed. It is not made for playing so if you are looking for a laptop to play even light games this is not for you. This is for people that works a lot outside home, it's fast, it's battery lasts a lot, the camera is located in a weird spot but who uses the laptop camera anyway. Really happy and satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Marmolejo

customer_reviews.title: Lightest laptop I have ever held
customer_reviews.text: Bought this laptop for my wife who needed a 10-key lightweight laptop. This fit the bill perfectly and I still can't believe how light it is every time I pick it up. My only wishes is that it supported Windows Hello and used USB-C for charging.
customer_reviews.author: MotoX

customer_reviews.title: I love this laptap
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptap, but it was broken only 1 month after I started to use. I couldn't fix it in my country due to no world warranty, I could fix it though the international service center of LG. I thanked the international service team of LG, but, I am so worried about the possibility of another anticipating problem, because it cannot to be fixed in my country. So, I recommend this laptop to people that don't care about the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: sang hyun kim

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best laptop I've ever owned. I was especially looking for a very light weight lap top with a long battery life and a good size screen. This is the best lap top available that I am aware of that ticks those particular boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: This is a great laptop! It's a little on the expensive side
customer_reviews.text: This is a great laptop! It's a little on the expensive side, however you get the bang for your buck. It's super light to carry, has a long battery life, and overall has great functionality. I would recommend it to any student or for personal laptop use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laptop. Love the weight and it is very ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent laptop. Love the weight and it is very sleek looking. Others complained about the speakers, the keyboard and display and I see no issues with any of that. The display is bright crisp and clear. Keyboard and mouse have no issues and the speakers are much better than I expected. I've had many laptops and so far this one ranks among one of my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Manzione

customer_reviews.title: I'm extremely happy with my product
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely happy with my product. It's late weight and fast. I'm still learning as I'm not yet used to Windows 10 yet. But I will say I love the design. Well worth what I paid for it
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast nice and compact and easy to set up, great computer for the price!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the laptop is great. Only downside is the keyboard sometimes is hard to type on... perhaps I'm not fully used to it, but the keys feel just a bit too light.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Selders

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Never, ever, ever, ever happier with a laptop purchase. Lighter than my 13" Asus, more robust than my 15" Lenovo. Beats the HP's and Dell's in my office. Great balance of hardware, performance and portability in a very well designed footprint. Excellent display in a minimalist bezel. Very decent keyboard. Lightening fast boot-up. First time I'm actually enjoying a windows 10 system. Delivers everything promised and executes flawlessly. Can't say enough about this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Bob G

customer_reviews.title: I love the weight
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this laptop. I have had it for about four months now. It is super light and has a long battery life. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: P. Yepes

customer_reviews.title: ... can't even begin to tell you how much I love this laptop
customer_reviews.text: I can't even begin to tell you how much I love this laptop!!! I certainly didn't want to spend this much on a laptop, but I'm here to tell you it is so worth it in my humble opinion. It is feather light, I love the keyboard, especially the fact it is now backlit. I love the fact of how quickly it comes up when you sign on. It's just so good!
customer_reviews.author: Southern Belle in MS

customer_reviews.title: Great overall laptop.  Had it not been for the charging issue, I would have probably kept it.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews we ordered this laptop at the end of November. I agree with others who have complained about the speakers lacking, I have smaller hands, so the keyboard is not a big issue for me, but my husband has complained about it's size. My main concern & reason that we are returning this laptop is that the charging port doesn't always make contact & you have to finagle it for it to charge. It's gotten to the point that it will only charge when you hold it into place.
customer_reviews.author: Andi Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It's been awesome. So light and portable
customer_reviews.text: Totally loving this computer!! It's been awesome. So light and portable. No issues after 6 months or so
customer_reviews.author: S. Filly

customer_reviews.title: SUPER LIGHT Back-lit keyboard Long lasting battery Pretty good processing ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: SUPER LIGHT Back-lit keyboard Long lasting battery Pretty good processing power Solid state drive, so no overheating Cons: Speakers suck, but I mostly use headphones anyway. When I do want to play audio in speaker mode, I just use a bluetooth speaker and it works just fine. Touch screen responsiveness is so-so
customer_reviews.author: Simple Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Full size workable laptop thats light and fast with 17 hours battery life!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this laptop, light and slim, fast and extremely long battery life. Easy to hook up large monitor/TV via HDMI port. I own a small IT company and have been showing it off to all my customers. Highly recommend. You will need to pay 100 bucks to join to domain--home to pro upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic machine. It does everything that I want with ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic machine. It does everything that I want with a lot of speed and power. I have not found anything that I have not loved about this computer yet! The keyboard is comfortable to use and your hand does not mess with the track pad like a lot of laptops I have had in the past do. The screen is incredible and due to the smaller bezel, the computer is significantly more compact than other 15.6 inch screens out there.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Judd

customer_reviews.title: So light you won't even know it is there.
customer_reviews.text: I carry around my computer a LOT, so the weight matters. My previous laptop was 3.5 lbs with a 15 inch screen, and going to this computer and its charger was absolutely a big differet. The screen is great, the keyboard feels nice (except for the location of the backspace keys which takes some getting used to).
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Logan

customer_reviews.title: Light, Powerful, Beautiful. Stunning, No Cons.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Laptop I have ever had, everything I wanted in a laptop. Light weight, beautiful, crisp display, lighter than anything. I wanted to get the MacBook Pro because it was very heavy. I have MacBook Air and Yoga. But this things beats all.
customer_reviews.author: Irfan Khan

customer_reviews.title: Best light weight windows laptop, but has a slight inconvenience with Linux
customer_reviews.text: Amazing laptop and wonderful experience. If you're a student and looking for a good, loght, fast, durable laptop with top of the charts battery life, this is it! There's only one drawback, and I am taking off one star for it: the sound card is probably not compatible with Ubuntu and related linux distros, and it makes an insane sound after restarting your computer sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Advait Bhatwadekar

customer_reviews.title: A USB type C port of this laptop does not ...
customer_reviews.text: A USB type C port of this laptop does not support a thunderbolt 3. It can be used for charging it, but available chargers are very limited. Also, most of dock systems with thunderbolt 3 and USB type C cannot charge this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Choi

customer_reviews.title: I will amend this if the next one is better.
customer_reviews.text: Screen did work out of the box, I will amend this if the next one is better.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B.

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop, ultra light weighted
customer_reviews.text: I love this new laptop!! It's fast and functional. I really can't tell it's refurbished. I works perfectly like a new product.
customer_reviews.author: Mireu

product_meta.title: LG gram 15Z970 i7 15.6" Touchscreen Laptop (2017 - Dark Silver)
product_meta.description: Style:i7 Processor /Touch ScreenAt just under 2.5 pounds, this LG gram arrives with an uncompromising 15.6 Inch Full HD IPS touch screen plus long-lasting battery life. A host of convenience features including multiple inputs (including USB Type-C), an Intel Core i7 processor, a back-lit keyboard, and Daylight Mode.
feature_bullets: Light Weight Laptop - Weighs Under 2.5 Pounds
15.6 Inch Full HD IPS Touch Screen Display w/ Ultra-Slim Bezel

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars79 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
